item.description:
Unless some thing big comes up (i.e. a blizzard), AJ intends on doing the winter edition of Flights of Fancy.  (And heck, I'm from upstate NY, so might do it even if there is a Blizzard.)

Event Details:

Register ahead of time online to reserve your spot (Participation is limited to the first 700 people to register with the Study), Click This link and then the Button on the bottom of that page to Register! Please Remember to Register for yourself, a meetup RSVP does not cover this.

On the day, go to "The Study" any time from 4-7 to sign in, pay your $10 event fee, and get a wine glass which is yours to keep.  From there you walk around downtown going from shop to shop on the provided map of particpating stores until 8pm.

Each participating store will pour a wine, and there usually is a discount on purchases made at that store.

At the end of the night you return to the Study for Coffee, Dessert, and a Raffle at 8:30.

If you want more info on the Event or it's sponsors, visit the Info New Haven Page at this Link!

NHC's initial Plan:

Get to The Study just before 5:00ish.

Depart for the first stop at 5:10 or however long it takes to get through the sign-in line.  I'll wait near the Doors of the Study until 5:10.  Make certain contact with me if you want to be kept track of with the group.

Plan will be to go to the North-East most shop in the Upper Broadway district first and proceed Southerly, then once finished in the Broadway area travel to the South-West most shop on Chapel or Crown and work our way back N.E. towards The Study.

If you're going to be late or get lost anywhere (including sign-in) then you can try and catch up with us along the path.

My Cell number is 315-345-9348, I'll try to answer but texting might be best as I'm not sure the cell reception in some stores.

Additional Info:

These are the Stores they now list as participating in the Advertisement:
1804 Fashion Footwear, Ashley's Ice Cream, Barnes & Noble , Campus Customs, Celtica, Claire's Corner Copia, Denali, derek simpson... goldsmith, Enclave, Ensons, Froyoworld, Hulls Art Supply & Framing, idiom, Metaphore, Laila Rowe, Lisa Jones Boutique, Peter Indorf Jewelers, Ten Thousand Villages, Tracy b, Wave Gallery, Willoughbys Coffee & Tea, and Yurway Design.

Newcomers to the event include: Au Bon Pain, Box 63, Origins, Savitt Jewelers and Chocopologie.

Prizes for the Raffle were donated by: Amadeus Center for Healing, Arpaia Lang, Euphoria Salon, Fresh Yoga, Olde School Saloon and Bistro, Seychelles and the Shubert Theater.

The grand prize is a complimentary overnight stay for two at The Study Hotel at Yale. (And last time some one from the group won.)

You can also get your parking Validated for the York Street Garage at 150 York Street.

If anyone would like to lead alternative groups for different start times or paths you're welcome to pitch in and we can add the alternatives here.

The event details list a shuttle between shopping districts.  We'll have to see if that fits best for the group that shows, or if people want to walk and or volunteer drivers.

Hope to See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't make the meeting you'll have to try to catch up on the trail and or call my Cell (315-345-9348). Intended path is listed in the Event.
item.name: Flights of Fancy
